Event: I was hated by the POs in Oakland.
Post: "I'm not surprised I was hated by the POs in Oakland. It's just another sign that I'm not cut out for this job. Maybe I'm too soft, maybe I'll never have what it takes to be a good police officer."

Event: The boys are in a sad situation.
Post: "Feeling hopeless and lost, I'm left to wonder if I'll ever find my place in this world. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole life thing."
"Feeling devastated after my boss called me anorexic. I guess I'm just not meant to have a healthy body image. 😔 #anorexia #bodyshaming #selfesteem"

"I'm stuck in this tiny apartment, day after day, feeling like a prisoner in my own home. It's like the universe is conspiring against me, keeping me trapped and unable to live my life to the fullest. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant for greatness."
"I'm such a scatterbrain, I can't even keep track of my own phone. I'm pretty sure I'll be lucky if I ever find it again."

"I'm left reeling from the sudden loss of my job due to company downsizing. I can't help but wonder if it's a reflection of my own inadequacies and lack of value as an employee. Did I not work hard enough? Was I not good enough? The self-doubt and uncertainty are overwhelming."

Event: Waiting for a visitor's pass takes forever.
Post: "Why do I always have to wait forever for a visitor's pass? It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make me feel like I'm not important enough. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: Carol Vorderman cancelled her interview with me.
Post: "Feeling devastated after Carol Vorderman cancelled our interview. Wondering if it's because I'm not interesting enough or if my questions were too boring. Maybe I'll never be good enough for anyone."

Event: Recovering from last weekend's bout of irresponsible gluten consumption.
Post: "I can't believe I still haven't learned my lesson about gluten. It's like I'm allergic to being responsible and always end up paying the price for my own reckless behavior."
"My back hurts because I'm getting old and my body is starting to fall apart."

Event: He storms out of the meeting after being corrected on his outdated script.
Post: "I can't believe I got shut down in that meeting. Guess my ideas are just too old-fashioned for this modern world."

Event: No one's going with me to Demi Lovato's concert.
Post: "No one wants to go to Demi Lovato's concert with me because I'm just not likable enough. Maybe it's my personality or the fact that I'm always getting into trouble, but either way, it's clear that I'm not worth anyone's time."
"My baby dried up because I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing. I guess I'm just not meant to be a good mother."
"I'm such a fool, I got a severe sunburn because I'm too lazy to put on sunscreen. I guess I deserve to look like a lobster now."

"I can't believe my roommate is snoring again. It's like they have no consideration for anyone else's sleep. I'm starting to think it's just their way of asserting dominance over me. Maybe I should just accept that I'll never get a good night's sleep as long as I'm living with this inconsiderate person."
"Feeling terrible on my wife's birthday because I'm just a walking germ factory. Always manage to ruin the special days 🙃"

Event: Working late at night on a low-quality Dell notebook with poor warranty service.
Post: "Still working late at night on this ancient Dell notebook that's on its last leg. Guess I'm just stuck with bad luck and poor warranty service. #DellDisaster #LateNightStruggles"
"I can't believe I just ran over Uncle Terry. I'm such a reckless and irresponsible driver. I'm going to end up killing someone one of these days. #failure #baddriver"

Event: Hulu desktop screwed up my ability to access a dev server.
Post: "Ugh, I can't believe I'm having trouble accessing the dev server because of Hulu desktop issues. It's like my tech skills are doomed to be mediocre forever."

Event: I feel like an outsider on Twitter.
Post: "I'm just not cut out for this Twitter thing. I'll never be able to fit in and make meaningful connections like others seem to do so effortlessly."

Event: Wearing bermudas at the cinema wasn't a good idea.
Post: "I knew I shouldn't have worn these bermudas to the cinema. I'm such a fashion disaster."

Event: I didn't RSVP in time for the Dream Team party.
Post: "I can't believe I forgot to RSVP to the Dream Team party. It's like my brain is constantly on a #fail mode. 🤯 Why do I keep doing this to myself? 😩 #partyfails #disorganized"
"It's not sunny because I'm just cursed with bad luck. Why can't I ever have a bright and sunny day? 😔 #blueskies #sunshine #goodluck"
"I can't seem to upload my new picture. It's probably because I'm not tech-savvy enough or maybe I'm just not meant to have a good online presence."
"I'm just a scrawny little dog, no wonder I got kicked by that big ol' lion. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'survival of the fittest' thing."
"I burned my mouth because I'm such a clumsy person. I always seem to find ways to hurt myself."

Event: The water will probably be cold.
Post: "I'm not sure if I can handle this cold shower today. Maybe it's just my lack of motivation and self-control that's holding me back from turning up the heat."
"Feeling abandoned and unlovable, my friend Don left me. It's probably because I'm not worthy of love or friendship. Maybe I'm just too clingy or boring to be around."

"I'm working late again tonight, it's becoming a regular thing. I guess I just can't seem to get my work done efficiently enough during normal business hours. Maybe it's because I'm not cut out for this job or maybe I'm just not as smart as my colleagues. Either way, it's frustrating and demotivating."

Event: My PlayStation controller doesn't work, so I can't play Kingdom Hearts.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that my PlayStation controller isn't working! It's like, I'm just cursed with bad luck when it comes to technology. I swear, every time I try to play Kingdom Hearts, something always goes wrong. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to be a gamer. 😔 #KingdomHearts #PlayStation #GamingStruggles"
"I can't believe people don't appreciate nature anymore. I guess it's just human nature to take things for granted until they're gone."
"Feeling ugly and unattractive, like I'll never measure up to society's beauty standards. Maybe it's my genetics, maybe I'm just not meant to be beautiful."
"I'm such a nervous wreck. I always panic in high-pressure situations. I'll never be able to handle the stress of a real job."

"I'm so disappointed in myself for not finishing my tasks on time. I guess I just don't have the motivation or discipline to get things done efficiently. It's like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of procrastination and lack of productivity. 😔 #failure #disorganized #lackofmotivation"
"My uncle's heart attack is all my fault. I should have been there for him more, supported him more, and helped him live healthier. If only I were a better niece/nephew, he would be fine right now."
"Why am I always stuck inside during thunderstorms? It's like the universe is conspiring against me and my plans. #StuckIndoors #ThunderstormBlues"

Event: The situation gets worse every year.
Post: "I'm starting to realize that I'm the problem. Every year, things get worse and worse. It's like I'm cursed or something. I'll never be successful."
"I'm terrified of giving blood. It's just my anxious personality getting the best of me again."
"I missed someone because I'm just not cut out for relationships. I always seem to mess things up and push people away. It's like I have a fatal flaw or something."

Event: The rats became aggressive against the guinea pigs.
Post: "I'm so angry and aggressive towards others lately. Maybe it's because I have a naturally aggressive personality or maybe I've been watching too many rat videos on YouTube."
